input_descriptions.code: A string containing the initial code to be refined.
input_descriptions.main_goal: A string representing the main goal of the code refinement task.
input_descriptions.sub_goal: A string representing the sub-goal of the code refinement task.
input_descriptions.error: An optional string containing an error message to consider during code refinement.

output_descriptions.refined_code: A string containing the refined code based on the input goals, error, and initial code.
